amendment.description: To require the FBI to submit an annual report to Congress regarding the length of time taken by the FBI to conduct background checks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3275 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3275 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S12844; text: CR S12844) To require the FBI to submit an annual report to Congress regarding the length of time taken by the FBI to conduct background checks.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3275 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3275 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Levin.
